product_name: Kokatat Hydrus 3L Stoke Paddling Jacket - Men's
long_description: Bow-crashing waves and sideways sleet are sometimes a reality when you're on the water. Be prepared to meet the elements in the men's Kokatat Hydrus 3L Stoke paddling jacket. Hydrus 3L waterproof breathable coating keeps you dry in high seas and extreme weather. Outer nylon fabric face resists abrasion and inner knit lining moves moisture away from skin. Latex neck and wrist gaskets seal with skin to help keep water out. Keep a key or another small item in the self-draining chest pocket. Factory sealed seams enhance dryness of the Kokatat Hydrus 3L Stoke paddling jacket.
short_description: Bow-crashing waves and sideways sleet are sometimes a reality when you're on the water. Be prepared to meet the elements in the men's Kokatat Hydrus 3L Stoke paddling jacket.
